email_text.subject: Editing check completed
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:

I just reviewed the edited post "{$submissionTitle}" for {$contextName}. The paper is ready for the final round of editing and graphic editing.

Thank you for your contribution to my work
{$authorName}
email_text.description: The author sends this email to the section editor to let him know that he has completed the editing process.
